title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the new documentary covering Derek Jeter's career and why we don't appreciate his career enough. He defends the big moves across the college football landscape and why there is nothing to worry about regarding the "health" of the sport. He criticizes the Nets for chasing attention instead of building a real championship contender. Plus, award winning journalist Tom Rinaldi of Fox Sports joins the show in studio to talk about his new podcast series and covering the MLB All-Star game. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
